properties.sfomuseum:description: Quick reference timetable issued by BCPA (British Commonwealth Pacific Airlines) for transpacific DC-6 sleeper service routes, effective February 19, 1952; fold-out format; blue, red, and white cover with text promoting service to Canada, USA, Hawaii, Fiji, Australia, and New Zealand; includes fare information.
